title: Is Accessibility Work Safe from AI in the Near Future?
excerpt: With AI advancing rapidly, accessibility professionals are questioning their career futures. We analyze the Reddit discussion that's sparking debate: Can AI replace human expertise in making digital content accessible? Explore expert insights on where AI falls short, which skills remain irreplaceable, and how to future-proof your accessibility career.
